stories.text: Looking for a way to easily schedule volunteers for ongoing/recurring group weekly meetings that is integrated with google cal. Calendly only works for on-off meetings. Basically, what I want to do is for a volunteer to be able to schedule a weekly shift (or even better multiple weekly shifts), and then automatically get a google cal invite for a weekly, recurring meeting. And I want the system to only take 50 people per shift. Any thoughts is an easy to use platform like this exists - or if we have to do something custom? Thanks!
stories.title: Calendly, but for Ongoing Weekly Meetings?

stories.text:
Sonzal Publishers is an E-book publishing company. It was founded in jammu and kashmir in 2021 by Hashim Tariq Bhat. It distributes a book in English, Hindi, Tamil, Bengali, Marathi, Malayalam, Gujarathi and Kannada. Sonzal Publishers provides you with all the opportunity of independently publishing with a hands on master driven methodology that assists you with distributing a book of the greatest quality and construct a stage for it to get it seen by millions around the world.
The company's stated goal is to help self-published authors make money of their books; according to the company, the author is allowed to keep 75% of the profit of their sales.
stories.title: Sonzal Publishers
Atlanta Chose Data over a World Series No-Hitter. That’s Baseball’s Big Dilemma
